name: Out of the Darkness (AiyaVerse)
description:
A girl wakes up with no knowledge of where she is and a very foggy memory. Join her as she looks around the place she awoke from.

This is a tale of a girl, named Olina, who woke up one day in the middle of a forest. She has no knowledge of where she ended up and her memory seems to be gone as well. Help her as she goes on her journey to discover what happened and how she can get back home.

This was made for the Mini Jam 103: Darkness

It is my very first game and it is just a small Demo so far. Please let me know what you thought, I hope you enjoy!
